## Greetings!

I'm an ecologist striving to understand and predict the dynamics of plant populations, communities, and distributions. I'm also passionate about data science and evidence-based STEM education. I'm currently a Postdoctoral Associate working with Dr. Tom Miller in the Department of BioSciences at Rice University.
